title: Internal Compiler Error: Broken MIR

labels.name: I-ICE
labels.description: Issue: The compiler panicked, giving an Internal Compilation Error (ICE) ❄️

labels.name: T-compiler
labels.description: Relevant to the compiler team, which will review and decide on the PR/issue.

body:
I tried this code: https://github.com/WalletConnect/echo-server/blob/harry/fix/cors/src/lib.rs, which modified the original working project to add CORS I expected to see this happen: this should have compiled successfully Instead, this happened: compilation failed and the compiler asked me to file a bug report ### Meta `rustc --version --verbose`: ``` rustc 1.69.0-nightly (1e225413a 2023-01-28) binary: rustc commit-hash: 1e225413a21fa69570bd3fefea9eb05e33f8b917 commit-date: 2023-01-28 host: aarch64-apple-darwin release: 1.69.0-nightly LLVM version: 15.0.7 ```
Backtrace

``` Compiling echo-server v0.14.2 (/Users/harryet/Development/WalletConnect/echo-server) error: internal compiler error: compiler/rustc_mir_transform/src/generator.rs:895:9: Broken MIR: generator contains type [&std::option::Option<&str>, &std::option::Option<&str>] in MIR, but typeck only knows about {ResumeTy, hyper::Request, &S, bool, &S, Pin>::Rejection>> + Send>>, Pin>::Rejection>> + Send>>, (), tracing::Span, &mut RelayClient, RelayClient, impl std::future::Future>, PublicKey, axum::http::request::Parts, B, impl std::future::Future::Error>>, axum::body::Bytes, Cow<'_, str>, std::option::Option<&str>, (std::option::Option<&str>, std::option::Option<&str>), &str, &&str, &Cow<'_, str>, &PublicKey, impl std::future::Future>, &S, Pin>::Rejection>> + Send>>} and [hyper::Request, &S] --> src/middleware/validate_signature.rs:35:88 | 35 | async fn from_request(req: Request, state: &S) -> Result { | ________________________________________________________________________________________^ 36 | | if !state.validate_signatures() { 37 | | // Skip signature validation 38 | | return T::from_request(req, state) ... | 79 | | } 80 | | } | |_____^ thread 'rustc' panicked at 'Box', /rustc/1e225413a21fa69570bd3fefea9eb05e33f8b917/compiler/rustc_errors/src/lib.rs:988:33 stack backtrace: 0: std::panicking::begin_panic:: 1: std::panic::panic_any:: 2: ::span_bug:: 3: ::span_bug:: 4: rustc_middle::util::bug::opt_span_bug_fmt::::{closure#0} 5: rustc_middle::ty::context::tls::with_opt::::{closure#0}, !>::{closure#0} 6: rustc_middle::ty::context::tls::with_context_opt::::{closure#0}, !>::{closure#0}, !> 7: rustc_middle::util::bug::opt_span_bug_fmt:: 8: rustc_middle::util::bug::span_bug_fmt:: 9: rustc_mir_transform::generator::mir_generator_witnesses 10: >::with_task:: 11: rustc_query_system::query::plumbing::try_execute_query:: 12: rustc_query_system::query::plumbing::get_query:: 13: rustc_mir_transform::mir_drops_elaborated_and_const_checked 14: ::with_deps::<>::with_task_impl, &rustc_data_structures::steal::Steal>::{closure#0}, &rustc_data_structures::steal::Steal> 15: >::with_task::, &rustc_data_structures::steal::Steal> 16: rustc_query_system::query::plumbing::try_execute_query:: 17: ::mir_drops_elaborated_and_const_checked 18: rustc_mir_transform::optimized_mir 19: >::with_task:: 20: rustc_query_system::query::plumbing::try_execute_query:: 21: rustc_query_system::query::plumbing::get_query:: 22: ::generator_layout 23: rustc_ty_utils::layout::layout_of_uncached 24: rustc_ty_utils::layout::layout_of 25: >::with_task::, core::result::Result, rustc_middle::ty::layout::LayoutError>> 26: rustc_query_system::query::plumbing::try_execute_query:: 27: rustc_query_system::query::plumbing::get_query:: 28: ::layout_of 29: rustc_ty_utils::layout::layout_of 30: >::with_task::, core::result::Result, rustc_middle::ty::layout::LayoutError>> 31: rustc_query_system::query::plumbing::try_execute_query:: 32: rustc_query_system::query::plumbing::get_query:: 33: ::layout_of 34: ::check 35: ::run_lint 36: rustc_mir_transform::pass_manager::run_passes_inner 37: rustc_mir_transform::run_analysis_to_runtime_passes 38: rustc_mir_transform::mir_drops_elaborated_and_const_checked 39: ::with_deps::<>::with_task_impl, &rustc_data_structures::steal::Steal>::{closure#0}, &rustc_data_structures::steal::Steal> 40: >::with_task::, &rustc_data_structures::steal::Steal> 41: rustc_query_system::query::plumbing::try_execute_query:: 42: ::mir_drops_elaborated_and_const_checked 43: rustc_mir_transform::optimized_mir 44: >::with_task:: 45: rustc_query_system::query::plumbing::try_execute_query:: 46: rustc_query_system::query::plumbing::get_query:: 47: ::encode_crate_root 48: rustc_metadata::rmeta::encoder::encode_metadata_impl 49: rustc_data_structures::sync::join:: 50: rustc_metadata::rmeta::encoder::encode_metadata 51: rustc_metadata::fs::encode_and_write_metadata 52: rustc_interface::passes::start_codegen 53: ::enter::<::ongoing_codegen::{closure#0}::{closure#0}, core::result::Result, rustc_errors::ErrorGuaranteed>> 54: ::ongoing_codegen 55: ::enter::, rustc_errors::ErrorGuaranteed>> 56: rustc_span::with_source_map::, rustc_interface::interface::run_compiler, rustc_driver::run_compiler::{closure#1}>::{closure#0}::{closure#0}> 57: >::set::, rustc_driver::run_compiler::{closure#1}>::{closure#0}, core::result::Result<(), rustc_errors::ErrorGuaranteed>> note: Some details are omitted, run with `RUST_BACKTRACE=full` for a verbose backtrace. note: the compiler unexpectedly panicked. this is a bug. note: we would appreciate a bug report: https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/issues/new?labels=C-bug%2C+I-ICE%2C+T-compiler&template=ice.md note: rustc 1.69.0-nightly (1e225413a 2023-01-28) running on aarch64-apple-darwin note: compiler flags: --crate-type lib -C embed-bitcode=no -C split-debuginfo=unpacked -C debuginfo=2 -C incremental=[REDACTED] note: some of the compiler flags provided by cargo are hidden query stack during panic: #0 [mir_generator_witnesses] generator witness types for `middleware::validate_signature::::from_request::{closure#0}` #1 [mir_drops_elaborated_and_const_checked] elaborating drops for `middleware::validate_signature::::from_request::{closure#0}` #2 [optimized_mir] optimizing MIR for `middleware::validate_signature::::from_request::{closure#0}` #3 [layout_of] computing layout of `[async block@src/middleware/validate_signature.rs:35:88: 80:6]` #4 [layout_of] computing layout of `[async block@src/middleware/validate_signature.rs:35:88: 80:6]` #5 [mir_drops_elaborated_and_const_checked] elaborating drops for `middleware::validate_signature::::from_request` #6 [optimized_mir] optimizing MIR for `middleware::validate_signature::::from_request` end of query stack error: could not compile `echo-server` ```
